SELECT tsd.style_no AS style, tsd.devt_type AS produceType, tsd.style_type AS styleType, tsd.size_range AS modelType, tsd.size_range_name AS modelTypeName, tsd.designer as designer, tsd.pattern_design_name as patternDesign, tssc.style_no AS bulkStyleNo, tssc.color_name AS color, tssc.tag_price AS tagPrice,
GROUP_CONCAT( hti.type, '(', hti.percentage, ')' ) AS ingredient_B,
ht.*, IFNULL(ht.template_part,tsd.pattern_parts) as templatePart FROM t_style_color tssc JOIN t_style tsd ON tssc.style_id = tsd.id LEFT JOIN t_hang_tag ht ON tssc.style_no = ht.bulk_style_no LEFT JOIN t_hang_tag_ingredient hti ON ht.id = hti.hang_tag_id
tssc.del_flag = 0 AND tssc.company_code = #{companyCode} and tssc.style_no = #{bulkStyleNo}
